title: Credit Manager – Mortgage Lending (Remote, PH/NZ)
job_overview:
Location: Philippines (remote) | Auckland or Remote (NZ-based) 
Employment Type: Full-Time 
Reports To: Director / Principal Adviser

About The Good Broker 

We’re a modern mortgage brokerage built for ambitious brokers and excellent customer outcomes. We back our brokers with marketing, technology, systems—and now, we’re hiring a Credit Manager to lift the standard of deal quality, turnaround times, and broker confidence.

Role Summary 

The Credit Manager is the go-to expert for loan structuring, credit policy, and lender strategy. You’ll work closely with our team of brokers and support staff to pre-vet deals, identify risks, provide lender matching guidance, and improve our overall approval rate. This is a high-impact, leadership role ideal for someone who loves deal strategy, problem solving, achieving positive customer outcomes and cutting through the red tape.

Key Responsibilities 
? Pre-assess complex applications and provide structuring advice to brokers 
? Interpret and stay current on all major NZ lender policies (banks & non-banks) 
? Identify risks or potential declines early and offer alternatives 
? Coach brokers on credit standards, documentation, and submission quality 
? Act as internal “credit escalation point” for tough or borderline deals 
? Liaise with BDMs and lender contacts to get exceptions or special consideration 
? Help build and maintain our internal credit policy knowledge base 
? Track reasons for declined applications and implement feedback loops to prevent them

You’ll Be Great If You Have 
? 5+ years experience in mortgage lending, credit assessment, or broking
? Deep working knowledge of NZ lender credit policies 
? Proven ability to structure complex loans and troubleshoot tricky deals 
? A calm, strategic mindset and strong problem-solving skills 
? Experience coaching or mentoring brokers or loan writers 
? Excellent communication and documentation skills

Bonus Points For 
? Experience in a similar Head of Credit / Credit Manager role at a brokerage or aggregator 
? Adviser or FAP licensing (or working towards it) 
? Familiarity with CRM tools like Trail, Mercury, or GoHighLevel

Why Join Us? 
? Work with a fast-moving, values-driven team 
? Technology-driven company
? Help shape the systems that make brokers' lives better 
? Be a key player in our growth, not just a cog in a machine
